flex2.compiler.common

Class ConfigurationPathResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.compiler.common.ConfigurationPathResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SinglePathResolver

    public class ConfigurationPathResolver
extends Object
implements SinglePathResolver
    Resolves files in a way specific to configuration files. Or, as Roger, points out, this could be renamed RelativePathResolver or something, since it just resolves things relative to a root directory.
    Author:
    Brian Deitte

      • ConfigurationPathResolver

        public ConfigurationPathResolver()

    • Method Detail

      • setRoot

        public void setRoot(String root)
        Set default root file. For mxmlc, we only want the root to ever be the context of a ConfigurationValue. For example, if a ConfigurationValue comes from "C:/flex/flex-config.xml", the root should be "C:/flex". If a ConfigurationValue comes from the command line, the root should be null. This method is public, because it's used by Flex Builder.

      • resolve

        public VirtualFile resolve(String path)
        Resolve the path as an absolute file or relative to the root or relative to the current working directory if the root is null.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface SinglePathResolver
